attributes.additional_details:
I think that the prices to enter and partake of the many wonderful Tourist attractions in London, as a Council Tax Paying resident, are very prohibitive.

I am proposing that as London residents we can have a card that entitles us to a discount on the entry prices / costs to these establishments and excursions.  I am sure that if the Government proposed an annual cost for the card of  approximately £20per annum that it would be a way of generating revenue and getting the venues to sign up to the scheme.
